item.description:
Didn't get to do a bike ride last week because of early weekend plans, but this week we're on again. This time I'd like to check out the trails along the power line running through the area (see http://maps.google.co... ).

CU on the trail, Christoph
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the northern end of Grater Road. Even though Google Maps shows the road connected, you can access the meeting point only from the North. Parking lot right before the "Gates ahead" sign. Cell 848-448-6663.
item.name: Grater Road II
